object_name.value: Send Document to Periodic Review workflow

title.value: Context for Send Document to Periodic Review workflow

dql_where.value: category = 1 and a_status in ( 'Effective','Suspended') and (next_periodic_review_date is not nulldate and next_periodic_review_date <= date(NOW)) and not exists (select r_object_id from cd_controlled_doc(all) where i_chronicle_id = c6_type_alias.i_chronicle_id and a_status != 'Effective' and r_creation_date > c6_type_alias.r_creation_date and is_periodic_review_version = true) and not exists (select * from dm_workflow w, dmi_package p where p.r_workflow_id = w.r_object_id and any p.r_component_chron_id = c6_type_alias.i_chronicle_id and w.r_runtime_state = 1) and not exists (select * from dm_workflow w, dmi_package p where p.r_workflow_id = w.r_object_id and any p.r_component_id = c6_type_alias.r_object_id and w.r_runtime_state = 1)

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
